remarks: The class of all sets with property ` ph ( z ) ` is closed under the binary operation on sets defined in ` R ( x , y ) ` .  (Contributed by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
statement:
cllem0.v $e |- V = { z | ph } $.
cllem0.rex $e |- R e. U $.
cllem0.r $e |- ( z = R -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cllem0.x $e |- ( z = x -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
cllem0.y $e |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
cllem0.closed $e |- ( ( ch /\ th ) -> ps ) $.
cllem0 $p |- A. x e. V A. y e. V R e. V $.
$d R z $.
$d V y $.
$d ch z $.
$d ps z $.
$d th z $.
$d x y z $.
